text: Tanoli or Tanawali are a Hindko-speaking ethnic group living in the Hazara area of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. The Tanolis claim descent from Barlas Turks, who were settled in this region by Timur after he conquered Hazara. ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Tanoli
